participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate, Laura has a love for music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I am doing well in school, thank you for asking. I hate my parents, but I love my job. I hate to lose.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and easygoing, Jake thrives on new experiences and enjoys life to the fullest.
participant_2.background: I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world. I love to sing in the shower. As long as I have a cup of coffee in my hand I am a happy person. I remember going on camping trips with my family and exploring the great outdoors. I am a barista.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing?
Hey! I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from a long journey.
Oh, that's awesome! Where'd you go?
I sailed around the world!
Wow, that's amazing! How long did that take?
It took about 3 years.
That's a lot of time on the water! What was that like?
It was amazing! I got to see so many different places and meet so many different people.
That sounds so cool! I'm jealous!
Thanks! I'm glad I got to do it.
So, what are you doing now?
I'm a barista.
Oh, cool! I love coffee.
Me too! I love making it and I love drinking it.
I hear you! I love getting a good cup of coffee in the morning.
Me too! It's the best way to start the day.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just enjoying my time off right now.
That's good! You deserve it.
Thanks
